channel.title: Portfowarding help please
channel.description:
alright i just portfowarded and when i run the server this comes up on my CMD
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:45) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:51) Press any key to continue . . .
can anyone help me? :confused:

item.title: Portfowarding help please
item.dc:creator: @Brazil_pkr10 Brazil pkr10
item.description:
@Brazil_pkr10 wrote:

@echo off
COLOR F0
Title Compiler
echo Compile Complete by Rafas / Rafascape hamachi
echo Specially created to You and Everyone
echo Have fun with your Server!
echo Checking Java version…
:checkjava
echo 06
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_06/bin/javac.exe” goto java6
echo 07if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_07/bin/javac.exe” goto java7
echo 08if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_08/bin/javac.exe” goto java8
echo 09
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac.exe” goto java9
echo 10
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_16/bin/javac.exe” goto java10
:java6
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_06
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_06/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end
:java7
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_07
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_07/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end
:java8
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_08
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_08/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end
:java9
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.6.0_11
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end
:java10
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_16
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_16/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end
:end
echo.
echo Complete!
echo.
set recomp=
set /p recomp= press enter to close
goto close
:close
echo.
echo closing compiler…

Use this Compiler
:rolleyes:
